definition: The word "regulär" refers to something that follows a set pattern or conforms to established rules. It is commonly used to describe events, activities, or processes that occur regularly or on a routine basis.

examples.english: The regular playing time is 90 minutes.

examples.german: Bitte beachten Sie die regulären Öffnungszeiten.
examples.english: Please note the regular opening hours.

examples.german: Der reguläre Preis für das Ticket beträgt 10 Euro.
examples.english: The regular price for the ticket is 10 euros.

examples.german: Die reguläre Wartungszeit beträgt eine Stunde.
examples.english: The regular maintenance time is one hour.
The regular delivery time is 3-5 working days.
